approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency in accessing and managing V-KYC recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings from the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient, especially for audit requirements. The project aims to streamline this process.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal/dashboard should be provided to the leads of V-KYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
Users should be able to upload an Excel or text file with a list of LAN IDs (up to 50) for bulk download.
The system should trigger a backend API call to process the bulk download request.
Results of the bulk download request should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should have pagination displaying only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time during bulk download.
The file upload should accept CSV/TXT files.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality (upload file, process, display results, download).
Display recordings in a tabular format with pagination.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal/dashboard should be restricted to authorized users (Team Leads and Process Managers).
The system should be able to handle a large number of recordings.
The system should be responsive and provide quick access to recordings.
success_criteria: V-KYC recordings are easily accessible to authorized users.
The time taken to retrieve recordings is significantly reduced.
The dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings is minimized.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
Limited access to the screen for Team Leaders.
assumptions: The existing infrastructure (NFS server, network) is reliable and available.
The API for retrieving recordings is available and functional.
The data format of the recordings is consistent.
risks: Network issues could affect access to recordings.
API failures could prevent access to recordings.
Data corruption could lead to incorrect recordings.
Security breaches could expose sensitive data.

recommendations: Add details about the security requirements.
Specify the performance requirements (response time, download speed).

recommendations_for_completion: Define security measures to protect recordings.
Specify performance metrics (response time, download speed).
